title: Sequential does not allow muti-output modules such as RNN, LSTM
body_html:
I think the forward function in Sequential should be modified to the following to be able to accept multi-output layers followed by other layers that require one input:

def forward(self, input): 
    for module in self._modules.values():
        input = module(input)
        if isinstance(input, tuple):
            input = input[0] 
    return input

Currently the following is not possible:
model = nn.Sequential(
nn.LSTM(…),
---> since LSTM will return a tuple, the forward function gives an error here
nn.Linear(…)
)
